credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Figure and drapery studies
medium: Sanguine, black and white crayons, on salmon pink paper
description: Vertical rectangle. Figure and drapery details: above, left, sleeve and hand; right, head and shoulders of woman seen from the back; below, left, head of a young man; right, drapery, clenched fist.
name: Drawing
